text: Binɨb Klays yɨl ma mɨdebal okok, yad taynen anɨgɨpɨm agɨl, tɨg asɨk lɨl ag gɨnɨm tek ma lup. God nokom nɨm, takaw anɨb okok tek kɨlop agɨnɨgab. Pen binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal okok, kɨli tɨtay gɨpal ak nɨbi nɨŋɨd tɨg asɨk lɨl, takaw anɨb ak tek agɨnɨmɨb tek lup. Buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl anɨb agak, Bɨ nɨbi tap si tap tɨmel gup anɨb ak nop dɨyokɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkak.
